name: 理查德·加纳
introduction: Trained at the American Conservatory Theatre, Richard Garner is an Atlanta-based actor, most recently appearing in The Hill, The Land of Loud Flavors (Bud Light Seltzer Hard Soda for Super Bowl LVI), Cobra Kai, Bigger, The Resident, Irrisistible, Dwight in Shining Armor and Hallmark's Christmas Everlasting. For 29 years he was the Co-Founder and Producing Artistic Director of Georgia Shakespeare. In addition to acting, Richard is a stage director with over 50 productions at Georgia Shakespeare, the Alliance Theatre, Theatrical Outfit, Synchronicity Theater, Orlando Shakespeare, among others.
